headline: Ask HN: What is your current setup/infrastructure to connect in case of outage?
description:
Hi!

I've started wondering how others people have had created their setup at home or office to connect in case of outage when the infrastructure is alarmed.

I have some ideas in mind, but also should keeps cheap and reliable (cost efficient). So..

What is your current setup/infrastructure to connect in case of outage?
